HOMAGE – I never knew how much love I had inside me… 13 year old book. 13 years have passed. I am still romancing with this vampire. I feel must be out of print now. I still remember my review… I was so young then and madly in love with this vampire but could not admit to myself… This is the story of a vampire, Al, who falls in love with a mortal woman, Roshani. The story developed very well, telling the tale of Al, the vampire and how he grew to accept his new existence. That all changes once he sees Rosahni. Even though, she is not an immortal, he can not prevent himself from falling in love with her. That love leads to his ultimate downfall as he physically and mentally transforms himself into a human. Such sacrifice depressed me entirely… Everyone knows (especially if you read my other reviews) that I have a weak spot for vampires. Not just for any old vampire but for the ones who are quite happy being immortal and who find a love strong enough to last throughout eternity. This story was good but I would have preferred a different fate for Al and Roshni. Oh, why did it have to end in such a way?? What can I say, I am a helpless romantic for immortals!  Rainbow by Dr. Makarand Fulzele (Author)

I hated what I had done, the girl on the side I was becoming. I walked away, you beconed me back. Told me our love would never be, I walked away you beconed me back. I know you are confused, you can’t love me and you won’t let me walk away. You know what to say to melt me. So I tried to heep you distant and keep you close. You wouldn’t let me. Love is like sunshine. It brings a golden glow to its beholder’s face. And a warm feeling all over their body. It awakens souls and opens eyes. And when its over, it leaves billions of small memories called stars. To remind the world, that it still exists.When you love someone, it’s something. When someone loves you, it’s another thing. When you love the person who loves you back, it’s everything.Love is strong yet delicate. It can be broken. To truly love is to understand this. To be in love is to respect this. It’s hard to tell your mind to stop loving someone when your heart still does. The best and most beautiful things in the world can’t be seen, nor touched, but are felt in the heart. Love is like sunshine. It brings a golden glow to its beholder’s face. And a warm feeling all over their body. It awakens souls and opens eyes. And when its over, it leaves billions of small memories called stars. To remind the world, that it still exists. When you love someone, it’s something. When someone loves you, it’s another thing. When you love the person who loves you back, it’s everything. The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is just to love and to be loved in return. Love is like the wind you can see it but you can’t feel it. A love that is denied only goes stronger. Love people, use things. Don’t use people, don’t love things. Don’t fall in love with someone you can live with, fall in love with someone you can’t live without. Love isn’t finding the perfect person, it is finding the imperfect person and seeing how they are perfect. If you love someone put their name in a circle not a heart because hearts can break but circles go on forever.

The fountains mingle with the river And the rivers with the ocean, The winds of heaven mix for ever With a sweet emotion; Nothing in the world is single, All things by a law divine In one another’s being mingle— Why not I with thine? See the mountains kiss high heaven, And the waves clasp one another; No sister-flower would be forgiven If it disdain’d its brother; And the sunlight clasps the earth, And the moonbeams kiss the sea— What are all these kissings worth, If thou kiss not me?

This is Valentine’s Day and I hope you get to see it today but either way I just wanna say Claudia like I have told you b4 these past months have been the best months of my life by far Especially when we were together I know things didn’t turn out the way we planned But I am still very thankful that you are in my life and I am in yours I cannot finds words that can describe the feelings u give me deep inside Yesterday (Monday) when you kissed me it felt just like day one, I wanted it to happen so bad And when it did it was way better than I imagined it, and I felt like I wasn’t even touching the ground when I kissed you When you pulled back and walked away teasing me like you always do I have to snap out of that lil dream and pause I was in and catch you b4 you leave Your smile is so exhilarating and exciting, your body is so seductive and yet so loving that when I hug you I never ever wanna let go But……there is something about your eyes that drive me crazy the way you look at me hypnotizes me instantly and it feels like I can see that much more of you….when really u are looking right thru me and, seeing my face and my expressions you smile and turn away but yet there I am still waiting for our eyes to meet again…I could look your eyes for hours and somehow feel so good inside…they say eyes are a important thing on a woman let me tell you this …your eyes are more than just important they are powerful, seductive, and simply beautiful……you can control me with just one look……and that look that I love so much when I push you up against a wall and hold you oh so tight ….DAMN!! its beautiful the way your eyes open up and you breathe a lil bit harder just excites me all over and makes me wanna grab you and kiss you forever….and never let you go…..and when I got to hold your hand yesterday while you laid on my lap…it was amazing I felt a spark when I held your hand as if the past had never happened and everything wuz better and back to normal….. Even though this day many couples get together and enjoy the plans they make…….it kills me that I cannot have my Claudia by myside right now, everythin I would be doing for you, to please you and romanticize and seduce you ..but only memories is what I have and they are what get me through the day….but the fact that I still get to talk to you makes me happy and helps even more than the memories bucuz I am still making memories with you everytime I talk to you…today would be 2 months and 16 days since we told the world me and u loved each other…..and that one Tuesday on November the 8th when we shared our first kiss is forever tattooed in my memories and in my heart….forever!!……….i will never forget that day on the bench…… Claudia my love, me and you are perfect for each other and we will always be perfect for each other and you know that, I wanna let you know I’m still keeping my promise on staying here forever and always being here if you need me…….and as a single tear rolls down my cheek it hurts me to say …..i hope your life turns out perfect …..with or……………… without me….…..becuz you are something so awesomely special and you DO deserve a perfect life…I do not wish to make you feel sad with this letter or bring up bad memories …..but ….this is my gift to you…..its my heart and what I feel inside…..and since I cannot see you in person I guess this is as close to a valentines gift I can get you. i hope I see you soon very soon!!!……and listen to the next couple of words and read them very carefully because I am saying these with all my heart…”Claudia my cuteness, I love you so much, and I miss you greatly….you are the first person that taught me to love like this….and I never knew my heart could hold so much inside…..it feels so big and stuffed with feelings I wanna sho you…..but I cant…..i hope you have a good valentines day and please take care of yourself ok  “ again ily and imy soooooo much I hope I see soon…goodbye…..my only love…:*:*:* ;*

Even though your married, even though your 19 years older than me, and even though you are my high school teacher, you are my everything. You made me live when I wanted to die, and I count down the days till I see you again. Everything you say to me sticks to me like that really sticky pritt stick I found in the kitchen the other day, I remember everything you tell me, everything you chat to me about, and all the times you have said hello and goodbye to me, even when you where in a bad mood and the last thing you want to do is teach me, you still make an effort. But it kills me inside when you talk about your wife, and I can remember the first time I realised you where married. I cried after leaving the lesson where I saw that ring on your finger. I can never tell you that I love you, Its not a crush, or a crutch, Its love. Nobody can ever know how I feel about you, How I dream about you every night, how you are the last thing I think about when I go to bed, and the first thing I think about when I wake up, and how I spend hours in the morning, getting everything ready just so I when I see you I look my best. But even though it hurts to remember that you are married, and all I want to do is pretend that you love me instead, I know that you love your wife like nothing else on Earth and she loves you just the same amount. I just hope that one day I can find someone who loves me just as much as I love them. Emm, I love you, and I swear upon my heart, I mean that.

If I could say everything I want to, I would say this:

darling: it’s the first time that i write a love message to you.i’m a little nervous now.. Today is your birthday,but we can’t celebrate together..it’s annoying and make me feel guity. idon’t want to have regret, so i thought about the ways to make this day different to us. at last i choose this way(because i think it’s unique and you would love it). maybe several years later, when our children have girlfriends(boyfriends),when we are getting old, we could take out this lettle and recall the past,sweet moments together warmly. let the time back to 2010.10.7. 20:00. middle school playground. “what to do next?” “what about going to KTV?” “but I can’t sing” “you can listen to me, I sing to you” “hao a, hao a!” “wait a moment, I call my friends!” 20:30. we came to my friend’s store.my friends had already be there.I put my arm on your shoulder just like your boyfriend.you are shy,and my friends all became surprised. 22:00. we are at KTV , I called some fruit, and feed you eat the fruit. 23:00. it’s time for you to go home .street lamp lit up the road.the night is quiet.”am I your boyfriend now?”I asked.”no” you reply after a little thought.I smiled and talk about other things.after a corner, you suddenly turned to me said seriously”remember to tell your female friends you have girlfriend now!”,”ok,ok!”I replyed. at that moment I feel on top of the world! the sweet moments always very short.we already arrived at the apartment you live.you walked to the corner,and a strong sense of loss came to me.it will be at least 3 months before we be together again,and tomorrow I would be on the railway to school.but things just like what act in the movies, you turned back , I stared at your face.and you sudderly kiss me on my face,and run back to the corner,leave me standing under the street lamp’s light . I touched my face, now,you are my girlfriend!
If ever you need me, I’ll be right here, To chase away the sadness, And wipe away a tear.

Life’s expectations have gotten to high, There are no tears left for me to cry. The pressure has pushed me to the ground, Tested my limits, kicked me around. What have I done to get myself here? Where will I be this time next year? What does the future hold for a person like me? Can I really live up to all I can be? I’ve made my mistakes and have hardened my heart, I’ve let people in that have torn me apart. So what’s left of the shattered pieces of me? What’s left of the girl locked up without a key? What’s left is a girl with a heart that’s been bruised, A soul that’s been exposed, a love that’s been used. So don’t tell me in time I’ll get over this pain, Don’t tell me that in this life I have something to gain. Because the way I see it this world is full of lies.

Just over a year has passed since we bumped into each other in Vegas, from the moment we kissed I knew you were the person I was put on this earth to meet. When we said goodbye at the Bellagio all I could think about was seeing you again and kissing you again. Weeks passed until we met again on London, we were both nervous as hell and scared if the other would turn up. When I saw you at the belt rack I was so happy, you kissed and cuddled me and we were back together and it felt amazing.
Every time I see your eyes light up when they see me, I know I can get through another day. When you call me your best friend I know that you are the one person who will always support me.
If I could read the love message I know you want to send me, it would go something like this:

Hi J, i’m writing this here because i’m not actually supposed to have these feelings in the first place. I kind of like you, and that wasn’t supposed to happen. Sometimes i sense you like me too, and i wait for that trail of a car or your lingering van, the click of the door. I like your golden eyes, and at times the softness, and your tone, subtle yet firm. Sadly you know someone that hates me, you went along with them without asking for real information, details, just following, and that pissed me off, it felt like a betrayal. Yet i feel that freakish nervousness when you approach, the same one i know you feel. The fear clogging my throat, the heat between my legs, i didn’t feel this way before.What the hell sort of stupid effect are you having? I’m so nervous, i cant even talk to you.
My Love,

I cant explain why you are in my life. Everything is not perfect or the way love has happened with other people, but I do know that when I listen to other people talk about their relationships, I like ours more. You asked me why I like you, I cant say its any one thing or even ten things or a hundred, I could only answer, Why not? I don’t know which of us will say “I love you” first, but I know without you saying it. Anticipating those words, makes me know that I wont take your love for granted and when we both feel safe to say them, they will have real value. I want to fill an empty place in your life instead of make one, and I knew I do when you said to me that even though you have been sleeping alone for a long time, you sleep better when you are with me and lately, I feel the same way. I hate our long distance relationship, I hope it won’t be forever.

The last year has been hard. I thought getting over you would be easy. Even with several continents between us I still find myself thinking of you everyday. I know I am idealizing our relationship. I even know that had we stayed together it would probably be over by now anyway. I also know we will probably never see each other again. I left the proverbial ball in your court when we last spoke. You’ll always know how to find me, at least until I leave the service. I want you to know that a small part of me will always miss you being a part of my life. They say time heals all wounds but this one will never heal; the pain will get dull with time, but never fully heal. I need to thank you though. I had been living the better part of my life without actually living it; moving through it instead on auto pilot. You made me realize that happiness is possible. I’m going to go out and find it; I hope you find it too. I wish you the best in life. If our paths should cross again I hope we can be friends again.

My Love Amir, Everything you do for me reassures me that I am appreciated. I want you to know that you mean so much to me. From the first day we met, you were determined to get to know me. We were best of friends like Sister and Brother. These days had gone and we couldn’t pretend that we can still be friends. you quickly grew on me. You are now my beloved one, my heart, my soul, my breath and everything to me. I want you to know that every moment we’ve spent together since that first day holds a special place in my heart. I was afraid at first that if I let you in I’d regret it, but I haven’t regretted a single moment. I trust you, and I know you’ll be there for me no matter what. I trust that you’ll be faithful to me and that you won’t hurt my heart. You tell me how you want only the best for me. You tell me how beautiful I am. . You just make me feel extra special; make me feel a sense of warmth inside. I want you to know that I love you for this! I love you for being so caring and genuine. I love you for everything you’ve done for me. I love you for the happiness and joy you bring to my life. I love you for you! We don’t even need to talk to communicate with each other. By just being together, holding hands, or cuddling, we can sense each other’s thoughts and inner feelings. I want you to know that I want the best for you as well. I want you to succeed and I want all your dreams and fantasies to come true. I know that in me you see a young woman full of kindness, understanding, and compassion. A young woman with an open-heart. A young woman who puts a smile on your face everyday. I will be that woman who’s there for you just as you’re there for me, the one who encourages you through life’s ups and downs. But ultimately, I want to be the woman who is your everything. Not an hour goes by that I don’t think about you. You have brought so much joy to my life and you give me so much to look forward to when I wake up every morning. I want you to know that I sincerely appreciate you and I can never tell you enough that “LOVE YOU!” xoxoxoxoxo

My love , In life, we receive a wonderful opportunity, and that is to love. Love comes in many forms. You love people in different ways and for different reasons, depending upon how they have touched your life. Love is a very powerful word and can describe a multitude of feelings, but its main context carries the same meaning. I want to tell you that the love I have for you is undying. It is a love that is strong and enduring and will stand the test of time. I truly feel blessed that you have become a part of my life and I cannot wait for the day that we can join our lives together. I want to lie next to you at night and fall asleep in your arms, only to wake to your beautiful smile. I want to share in your joys and sorrows. I want to be your everything. You are everything to me. You are everything I do. You see and bring out the best in me. You are the one I want to share everything with – my thoughts, hopes and dreams. Thinking of you makes my heart feel full. You are such a source of inspiration for me. I will forever be indebted to you for all you have brought to my life. So, to repay you, I promise you my heart and all the love in it for the rest of my life…. Love always, Your Angel Chloe

“Love is a temporary madness. It erupts like an earthquake and then subsides. And when it subsides you have to make a decision. You have to work out whether your roots have become so entwined together that it is inconceivable that you should ever part. Because this is what love is. Love is not breathlessness, it is not excitement, it is not the promulgation of promises of eternal passion. That is just being “in love” which any of us can convince ourselves we are. Love itself is what is left over when being in love has burned away, and this is both an art and a fortunate accident. Your mother and I had it, we had roots that grew towards each other underground, and when all the pretty blossom had fallen from our branches we found that we were one tree and not two.”

30 years ago we met and I fell in love with you. We lost the opportunity and a child that could have been, it is something I have regreted for many years, I take full responsibility. Much I wanted to tell you but I worked for the government, hence the erratic dangerous life and the people that dissapeared after I left town. They needed some time out for being bad. The name people knew me by was my cover, the name I gave you was my real name, I trusted you with my life. It was an act, I’m just a pussy cat (smile).  You left me because you felt no future was secure with me and your society was superior. You were wrong, I have gone beyond my own expectations, have received my inheritance and able to return to my native country. The dirty war is over. I have travelled the world, have become a billionaire, have a home and children and a wife I love dearly and yet, every December my heart feels as if a part of me was lost in Chicago.

If ever you think of me out of the blue, just remember it’s all the kisses I’ve blown in the air finally catching up with you In my thoughts of you there is an underlying love that is present in every word, every glimpse I hope you feel it as I do, for it is what I am and ever I will be.

Wow, almost 13 years I have loved you, and it feels like only a few months. So many people don’t believe in true love or soul mates, I was one of them, until my lips first met yours. To fall in love at 16 is easy, but to stay in love for more than a decade is next to impossible. We tried to sow our oats with others, but ours souls were drawn back to one another. We have been through so much, but our feelings have held strong. Now we are the parents of two beautiful children and our devotion has expanded to include them in the circle. Isn’t it amazing how the heart has an infinite amount of love? You don’t have to love one less in order to make room in your heart for another, I never thought I could feel my heart actually swell, but 5 years ago when our son was born it did. Then I was sure my heart was full, ready to overflow and not able to hold anymore, but I was wrong. Two years later our baby girl was born, and it grew once more. Now our family is complete, and I only can hope that our kids will one day feel for someone and receive from them the love that we feel for each other. I love you baby, here’s to 13 more wonderful years!

I Must Confess…A couple of months ago you sent me a note with a heading just like this one…today, on the eve of an important milestone in our lives, I choose to use that same headline to tell you something that perhaps, you’d be astonished to read about. I just want you to know that this is more than eloquent words, that nothing has change and I do keep trying and trying to figure out what do I need to do to stop and I don’t seem to find an answer. You told me and I know you still think and care, but circumstances other than you and me prevent a beautiful and natural and exciting adventure from materializing into somethig wonderful and life long. All I know it is in God’s hands and if it is His will, there’ll be a way regardless of what others say or think or do… Truthfully and undoubtedly I cannot fool myself. I would be lying if I uttered that I don’t and I won’t lie to myself. The heart is more powerful than the mind and when it’s real like this, it has no end and no beginning. I really miss you and there are no words to describe it, and I guess missing you this much is what makes it so hard to just move on and allow someone else to help me forget you. After all, while we were together and despite of all your jealousy I never had a thought other than you and it seems that now when I do have the opportunity to get on with my life, I still can’t. I told you once that no matter with whom or where, I will always love you and will always be here for you. I never thought how powerful those words were, but I guess I really meant them then and now I can’t take them back. Anyways, happy anniversary. God bless you and fill your days with happiness and love

Two Loves My First Love While going through a very rough and merciless divorce, I was borderline nutcase. My stamina deteriorated, my attitude was awful and I believed in nothing. I started giving up to alcohol and nothing, but bad thoughts, overloaded my mind. I was then approached by my first Love. He pulled me out of the psychological misery I was in and gave me strength and direction. I’m a better man now, thanks to him, who came in my life when I needed the most. He was there all the time for me, I just didn’t see him because I was too busy looking away to the material things among all of the things we fall for. Jesus came to pull me out of the dark hole. Like a tornado, he yanked me away. He showed me how to love and what love is about. The first thing he asked me to do was to be humble. Right after that, things started happening. My Second Love Afterwards, I was then in the middle on the happiest time in my life, although I felt a little alone. I prayed hard for someone who would love me for who I am and with the religious ethics I have. It didn’t take time to meet Benny, (short for Bernadette) on the internet. She was more or less going thought the same ordeal as I was. We talked on the phone and fell in love. We are not sure how and when it happened, but it happened. After a few days we utilized the internet to see each other through web cams …we were 6,000 miles apart. Through the web we slept, cooked, play chess and spent lots of time “together”. She even brought me to work to meet her co-workers and friends. After feeling comfortable with each other, the time to visit Benny arrived. When we met at the airport, I was so nervous. But right away, when I saw her through the thick glass of the airport windows, I felt at ease. Like if I was about to get together with someone I’ve met a long time ago. She looked into my eyes, really focused. With the passion and intensity I’ve never seen in any eyes before. Once outside the airport, we kissed. I was the tenderest kiss I’ve eve felt. I couldn’t believe I was living that moment. We shared ten days of the most passionate romance I could imagine. She was everything I expected, a real woman. …A woman with true feelings, no mask and willing to give 100% to the right man. The time to come back home arrived. I didn’t want to leave her behind, but I had to. My heart pounded inside my chest at the airport as I felt alone again. I was afraid wouldn’t see her again. But because of technology, that feeling diminish quite a bit. We communicated through voice, text and internet very consistently. We wanted each other to know that we were there …in love. After a few weeks, Benny decided to visit me. Once again, we had a glorious time. She had met my family and shared with them. Looking at someone I’m in love with sharing with the rest of the people I love made my heart pound again. …I was the happiest man on earth but the time to split again showed up. This time I felt concrete, strong and really committed. My feelings for her were solid and I swore nothing would get in the way of us. Distance was our number one obstacle but we were managing pretty well. After a while, distance played tricks in my unsecured mind. We had frequent arguments for non-sense …my non-sense. I was blinded by the shadows of previous failures. I was prejudiced and had fear. Here I was having doubts about a woman who had chosen to leave her career, her home, her friends and her family behind for …our love. I was blessed with Benny but my insecurities were stronger that my common sense. …Until I went back to my first love for help. He, once again, was there for me. He spoke and I listened. He lifted that cover I had in front of my face to allow me see Benny. I didn’t see the light …I was holding it! Now, today, my insecurities and fears are gone. I can see. I can understand that love comes attached to faith, trust, honesty, and many other attributes and responsibilities. I miss Benny. I miss her laugh and her smile. I miss when she sang on my ear on the way to the university and the way she looked at me …straight into my eyes, telling me how much she loved me without words. I miss her kisses. …I miss everything about her. I know words sound pretty and I could write a book about our love, but nothing shows love more clearly than actions. And these are my intentions …to take action and show Benny how much I love her and care for her. I’m committed to place Benny’s needs before mine and I would do anything for her, because I’m a man in love and a man in love can accomplish anything. She will see. I know she is the one, she is my Second Love and she was sent to me by my First Love. I love you Benny.

Well this message is for anyone to read. I just had to share my feelings towards my love with the world. I love him more than anything in the world, even though we are literally worlds apart. 5 years ago, he said the three special words every girl/woman wants to hear from a special one…..and despite the fact that I knew there were going to be problems, i said yes, because truly I believed I loved him as well. We both knew that pretty soon, I would have to move away, since my family was moving, but that couldn’t stop the feelings. 5 years ago today, we last met–smiling, because both of us were hopeful about a future together. I moved away and lost all contact with him. The love never died….the first few weeks, months, it was a horrible feeling to be away from the one I loved, but then I started to accept my fate. But I repeat the feelings never died. We found each other online a couple months ago–and the long distance calls began. We still love each other. We still want each other in our lives. My days are passed waiting for his messages, and nights go by dreaming of him. I wake up with tears in my eyes in the mornings, because after the beautiful dreams when eyes open, reality hits and hurts. I have no clue when I can go back, he has responsibilites that require him to stay there. He says he will wait for me, I ask for how long?
Love is the shortest distance between hearts.

I can’t force you to do or demand of you whatever I wish you to do for me, can’t ask you to flee with me in a distant island where we two would be possible for each other. I can’t do these things since I know my dreams could shatter many people’s reality and can’t even take the pain I’m going through. When I look back over the last 29 1/2 yrs, I am amazed & awestruck at how quickly the time has flown by….but, the heart/spirit doesn’t always recognize the passing of time in quite the same way that our “logical minds” do… It was only “yesterday”, when you were riding your tricycle in the back driveway, playing with your imaginary friends (”Dooney” and “Mayla”) and helping me in our garden, while your big sister was at school….fast forward a few yrs, and you are running into the chain-link fence, the first time the training wheels came off of your bicycle….then a few more years pass, and we are riding off in the early morning hours, each of us on our bicycles, heading off to school and work, riding thru the cool morning mists, with the feeling of “freedom” that comes of riding fast thru the shadows of light and dark, just as dawn was breaking thru….

Your Message: Long time ago, there was a boy and a girl. They weren’t a couple, they even didn’t know each other well. She was a crazy girl, with a milion ideas on a minute, he was a real freak, and didn’t care of anything. She was a typical girl – loving shoping, fun and boys, he was a untypical boy. He liked drinking soo much, but she also did, so she didn’t care. The days were going, and they still were coming closer to each other. One day she discovered, she’s in love. It scared her – he didn’t want to fall in love beacuse of bad memories, so everytime he came to her, she walked away. Then came holiday – they haven’t seen each other for two months, and in this time all changed. On the first day of school, they met again. She looked better than before, her skin was darker, hair were shining like never did. Holidays gave her also time to think – she wanted him so much, now she wouldn’t say ‘no’. But his behaviour was so strange… He had a new girlfriend, friends. She thought, he changed soo much. He didn’t pay much attenction to her. Of course, he talked – but something was other, weird in his sights, voice.
Pure as morning dew is the joy that fills my heart when I’m with you.

Your Message::                  After everything we’ve been through, you’re still the one who makes me shine the way I love to. You protect me and comfort me and dry the tears, even when you don’t know why I’m crying.  You are my biggest supporter, and you’ll probably never know how much that means. Telling you I love you just doesn’t sufficiently describe all the things I feel inside when we are together.  This summer away from you, if I should go, will be extruciating because I won’t have your eyes to compliment my own or your touch or your smell.  I haven’t even left yet, and already I am ready to come home to be with you.
Just you and me.

We’ve got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can’t just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it’s going to get on by itself. You’ve got to keep watering it. You’ve got to really look after it and nurture it.

The hearts of many divided into many more still remain the whole of one. The one of many and yet a singular one is the source of love symbolized by the hearts of many and yet still one. Being of one, the two hearts of the many meet and in meeting reflect upon each other identical image. Upon a reciprocal reflection, the two recognize in each other themselves and see in themselves the source of love. The love they see is much more than any love found within a composite of form but is the source of that form and any other form of the same nature. Love, therefore, creates lovely form and in that lovely form observes itself in the lovely form of another. We, as composite results of love, perpetuate love which in turn reciprocates form. The one is our love, shared with the love of all other hearts, we are of one and thus are one.

“O Ser Humano é parte de um todo chamado por nós de ‘universo’, uma parte limitada no tempo e no espaço. Ele experiencia a si mesmo, seus pensamentos e sentimentos, como alguma coisa separada do resto – uma espécie de ilusão de ótica de sua consciência. Essa ilusão é uma forma de prisão para nós, restringindo-nos a nossos desejos pessoais e à afeição por umas poucas pessoas próximas. Nossa tarefa deve ser a de nos libertar dessa prisão alargando nossos círculos de compaixão para envolver todas as criaturas vivas e o todo da natureza em sua beleza.”

It’s amazing what I find to hide from myself; first my fear, then my desire and now my true emotions. I know what I feel for you is exactly what I should not feel. But who has command over their hearts? My will is defeated and my heart overwhelmed. I resist the urge to close my eyes and give you my heart, but fear holds me back. Not the fear of being hurt, for I know that is inevitable. I fear something greater. I fear that if I utter those words, then all I have denied myself will become real. And even worse, if I bare my heart only to find that you don’t feel the same way; oh what a fool I will be. But will I be a greater fool to shut my heart away to collect dust? I rather give it to you and believe that perhaps you loved me back. Although circumstance and an ocean will eventually separate us, I want to believe that someone did care about me, that someone burned with passion for me, that someone over there will miss me. I know that when you leave, I will still feel the brush of your face, your lips lingering on my skin, and your essence branded on me. And that will be enough to haunt me until destiny returns you to me.
Never in my life i wept a tear for someone like you. Somehow when my heart aches you patch it back for me. Tears won’t substitute how much you’ve cared for me.

For Our Lovers over Seas,

Do you remember how we met? Of course you do. It would have been certainly easier to meet while we were studying at the same college, but by chance – or maybe by destiny – we were supposed to meet on a very different location. It almost sounds like a fairy tale.

Hello Dien, Why does it seem to be that I find the words to say long after we’ve departed? I don’t understand it. When you gave me that hug today, all I wanted was for you to never let go…but I didn’t realize it until I was home, sitting at this computer desk yet again. Why do I find myself writing you letters everywhere? Why am I constantly stealing things from places to bring to you..when I know that you’ll never actually get them? You know, I have a box of things for you. And about you. It’s been in my room since February. I told you about it once, but you didn’t seem to get the picture, I don’t think. You asked me about it later, and I told you it didn’t mean anything…I fell a bit stupid for it… I don’t even know what to say about us anymore. It’s so hard for me to just be friends with you, when I want so much more. I know I always will. And yeah, you’re 20, but I really and honestly don’t care. I never have. Anyone who has a problem with it can choke themselves with a spork. Seeing you is hard, but not seeing you is harder. And now you’re moving tomorrow, and I don’t know what I’m going to do. Why didn’t you tell me the time was creeping up so fast? It hurts so bad, and I don’t think you can even fathom the magnitude of pain… I see these love letters getting shorter, and I see the love of my life slowly slipping away. I see my family slowly drifting away from me, and I see the hate and discriminating I will always get…

I’ll never forget, the next day, seeing Honey sitting outside the tube station waiting for me (even though I was early). We sat outside a bar, across the street from the Dublin Castle and then we went to see Swingers. That’s our movie. We continued walking in Camden for a while and I asked her if she wanted to come over and watch TV. I swear that’s what I meant, too. I just figured she was fun and it would be fun to watch King of the Hill with her.

You are out there and I want you. I want to smile lovingly at you and tell you that you are wonderful. I want to caress your face and touch your shoulder and smooth your neck as I go by. I want to tell you in a million ways how deeply I love your scent, your touch, your voice. I love you and want to do everything for you. I want to follow you anywhere in the world and be yours forever. I want to be old beside you and sometimes have nothing to say. I want to feel you in my heart, my mind, my soul. I want to know you and yet always be learning you. I want to long for you when we are far apart and know that you are also longing for me. I want to know that when a love song plays that it is pail compared to our love. I love the idea of you and I want to love you.
I am here and you are there cannot touch cannot kiss cannot hold each other but in our hearts and in our arms when we are together

Babies of mine You were never born into this world. However, that’s not to say I didn’t love you – I still do. 1997 and 1999 – both conceived February – two years apart – exactly. Ironically, you both died at 8 weeks into my two pregnancies. And I so grieved for you – both of you. I think it was even worse the second time. I grieved for the first all over again – the loss was unbearable. Was it something I did? Why did you both die? I’m a spiritual person -In so many ways And have been to see many clairvoyants in my lifetime. Several have told me that you were both girls. That my Nan is looking after you both – as you grow up in the spirit world. I think of you both frequently – Thinking of the ages you’d both be now. What you would look like, what you would wear? What things you’d like to do, the colour of your hair. Would you be stubborn, shy, or extrovert? Would you be creative, sensitive – maybe tomboys? Would you look like me? Be similar to me in your ways? As you know, I’m no longer with your Dad. I know you watch over me – and you see it all. You saw how he treated me – the mental and physical violence. You were best off not being a part of that situation. He may have turned on you, my lovely girls. And you know, although I took the violence that he dealt me I would have killed him if he had harmed either of you. You would have loved Peter – my wonderful Husband now. He would have treated you as he treats me – with love and respect. It must be hard for him to listen when I talk about you both Another man fathered you – (if that’s what you can call your dad) But, he would love you as his own, had you been here with us, in our world. I just wanted to tell you both that I still think of you – often. You’re not forgotten – just because you are not here physically. You probably already know, but it’s always nice to be told that you are loved. Don’t give your Great-Nanny too hard a time, girls! She’ll tell you off, and be cross with you both! I know, from personal experience, when I was your age! I also know that her heart will swell with pride when she looks at you both. Say ‘hello’ to her, my Dad too, give them a hug and a kiss from me. There are so many others – your family – you must have met up with them. Say ‘hello’ to everyone – and I hope you will all meet me when I arrive there. There is no time, not where you are. So however long it takes me I will see you, my daughters, when it is my time. You’ll know when that is. This was meant to be a poem for you both, but it’s turned into a letter! But just expressing myself, to you both, like this, has helped me feel better. (See, some of it rhymes!!) – God Bless Girls. Lots of love from Mummy xxxx

Você diz, menina não é assim, eu não te basto, você não me sustenta… Eu sei, eu sei, mas tem que ser assim? Enquanto tocar a ópera eu obedeço os acordes e danço meus passos inventados, aprendidos pouco a pouco, me esqueço dos calos, das feridas não cicatrizadas, sangue escondido atrás de faixas. - Vem, dança comigo. I know that falling in love with your best friend can be a blessing and a curse.  On one hand, you know me better than anyone does in this world. I have more fun sitting around with you and doing nothing productive, than I do with anyone else.  You’re my wing man.  On the other hand, you don’t know how much I have fallen in love with you.  I’m sure you’ve picked up the strange vibes from me, here as of late, but I don’t know how to vocalize what I am feeling.  This is mainly due to the fact that I don’t know how you will react to this.  I don’t know what you will say to me.  I couldn’t imagine my life without you in it.  So, I suppose I will try to say it in a letter, and hope that you do read this. We make an amazing team together, you and I.  And, life, nor love, does not get much better than that.

It’s 12:18am and am exhausted, and I cannot imagine how tired you are. You get up so early (4am? Not even sure. When was the last time I got up that early?) and you go to work at a job you don’t exactly love, for too little pay, and you work way too much.And yet, when you come home, and I have to go to work, you take care of the kids, and make dinner, and tuck them in.And whenever I am down, you are there for me. I was so sad tonight, and you always listen and take me side! It’s been 14 years since we got married, but I swear it seems like 2 years. Time just rushes faster and faster, like a snow ball rolling down hill gathering momentum. We’ve been through a lot together, births and deaths, and things I never would’ve imagined would happen to us. I guess we are supposed to be grown ups now, I guess we are supposed to be strong. I couldn’t do any of this without you. I live for the days when I can lay my head on my pillow and just talk to you about random things. And you always make me laugh, and you are a fabulous cook…good thing one of us is.I just couldn’t imagine not having you there every day. I am really grateful that you put up with me, and love me.You are a really good person.Thank you.

Rollercoasters are nothing compared to us– we’ve been up and down, and yet with each wave of it, we defy gravity, for each low is lower than the last, yet each high is limitlessly higher. It has taken me a while to figure it out, but now I know exactly how it is that you have blessed me over the last five years: you have actually made my heart bigger. Every time I fall in love with you, it seems that you take my whole heart, and I can’t possibly love you any more. But then you come around again and I see that I love you even more than before.

Mrs. Me was born in Pella, Iowa with CP (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cerebral_palsy) in the 1960′s and because of her disease was considered to be a burden, a lost cause, and a general waste of energy.
